deck: Peggy is finally trusted with a mission and calls upon her trusted Howling Commandos squad for backup. But her cover could be at risk when SSR Chief Dooley also sends Agent Thompson with her.
description: Peggy is finally trusted with a mission and calls upon her trusted Howling Commandos squad for backup. But her cover could be at risk when SSR Chief Dooley also sends Agent Thompson with her.
name: The Iron Ceiling

description:
Japnese title: Akuma wa Hito no Kokoro ni Sumu (悪魔は人の心に棲む)

Rin Okumura begins to worry about his future as his twin brother, Yukio, is starting school at the prestigious True Cross Academy. Sent to a job interview by his foster father, Shiro, Rin encounters a demon-like creature and causes havoc in the store.
name: The Devil Resides in Human Souls

description:
Japanese title: Gehena Gēto (虚無界の門)

Rin is thrown into turmoil when Shiro tells him that he's the son of Satan! Warning him that he must never draw it, Shiro gives Rin the Koma Sword, and hides him in the monastery basement. Outside, a fierce battle begins...
name: Gehenna Gate
All the Best People Are Mad

first_appearance_objects.name: Iron Man Hulkbuster Armor Mk. I

object_credits.name: Iron Man Hulkbuster Armor Mk. I

description:
Japanese title: Ani to Otōto (兄と弟)

Vowing to become an exorcist, Rin is taken to True Cross Academy by the mysterious Mephisto, a friend of their late father. Later, Rin heads to the Exorcist Cram School, as Mephisto warns: “You must keep that you’re the son of Satan confidential.”
name: Brothers

description:
Japanese title: Amahara no Niwa (天空の庭)

When Yukio takes on a case, Rin tags along with him to the Exorcism Supply Shop. There he meets Shiemi, a girl with ailing legs, tending to her garden. Yukio examines Shiemi's legs and finding demonic traces, speculates that the garden is the cause.
name: The Garden of Amahara

description:
Japanese title: Tatari-dera no Ko (祟り寺の子)

Rin is always snoozing in class, much to star pupil Suguro's irritation. Suguro's striving to become an exorcist so he can restore his family's temple in Kyoto, and being classmates with such a slacker is more than he can bear.
name: A Boy from the Cursed Temple

description:
Japanese title: Maboroshi no Ryōrinin (まぼろしの料理人)

The biggest headache of Rins school life is his daily meals. On Yukios advice, Rin starts cooking in the dorm kitchen, preparing lunch the night before. But in the morning, all the food has vanished!
name: The Phantom Chef

description:
Japanese title: Tomochidori (友千鳥)

To overcome her shyness, Shiemi secretly vows to Make friends! But shes foiled by her klutziness. After displaying her Tamer skills in class, she finally asks Izumo to be her friend! Soon after, the Exorcist Cram School holds a boot camp.
name: A Flock of Plovers

description:
Japanese title: Koko ni Yameru Mono Ari (此に病める者あり)

Crushed by her failure to save her best friend, Izumo lashes out at Suguro! Their bickering escalates until the whole class is involved, and they're all sent to detention. Suddenly, the students are attacked by the ghoul Rin fought the day before!
name: Now A Certain Man Was Sick...

description:
Japanese title: Omoide (おもひで)

Fighting together for the first time, Rin and the others barely survive a harrowing attack. Suddenly, Mephisto and the cram school teachers are before them! Sensing something odd in Noihauss behavior, Yukio confronts the teacher, only to discover
name: Memories

description:
Japanese title: Ketto Shī (黒猫)

After the excitement of being promoted to ExWire, Rin is soon disgusted with his load of homework. Then, Yukio is summoned for an urgent mission! The familiar of the Knights of the True Cross has gone berserk, and Yukio has to deal with the crisis.
name: Black Cat

description:
Japanese title: Shinkai no Akuma (深海の悪魔)

Rin, Shima and Izumo have been sent on a mission, only to end up working instead. They meet a boy named Yohei and learn of the "Demon of the Deep." Yohei lost his father to this monster, and wants revenge. Worried, Rin and the others watch over him.
name: Demon Of The Deep

description:
Japanese title: Onigokko (鬼事)

The class investigates ghost sightings at an amusement park. Rin is partnered with Shiemi, and they find the ghost of a child. He runs away, turning things into a game of tag! Separated from Shiemi, Rin is confronted by Amaimon, King of Earth.
name: A Game of Tag

description:
Japanese title: Shōmei (証明)

Senior Exorcist First Class Shura Kirigakure stops the battle between Rin and Amaimon. Rin learns that Shura was once a disciple of Shiro's - and that Shura has targeted him for elimination - "the job that my mentor failed to do!"
name: Proof

description:
Japanese title: Tanoshii Kyanpu (愉しいキャンプ)

The first semester has ended, signaling the start of summer vacation for True Cross Academy students. But theres no rest for Rin and the other ExWires: they must take part in a 3-day drill to prepare for actual combat, under the guise of a camping trip.
name: A Fun Camping Trip

description:
Japanese title: Yasashii Koto (やさしい事)

Suguro's joint strategy pays off, and the Exwires have success in their sights! But then a gigantic moth demon (cuchi) appears, and attacks Rin!
name: Act of Kindness

description:
Japanese title: Kake (賭)

Consumed by the power of the flames during his battle with Amaimon, Rin goes berserk! He regains control of himself once his power is exhausted...only to be captured by the current Paladin, Angel!
name: The Wager

description:
Japanese title: Yūwaku (誘惑)

As the hearing drags on, the Order finds itself unable to decide on Rin's fate, because Mephisto has proclaimed him to be "a weapon for counterattacking Satan." Just then, something happens!
name: Temptation

description:
Japanese title: Gufū (颶風)

Rin undergoes training to master his demonic flames, when a giant bird-like demon swoops in on him! After driving it away, all of the Cram School members are sent to investigate how the demon infiltrated the academy...
name: Gale

description:
Japanese title: Nandemonai Hi (なんでもない日)

The Exorcism Cram School students are having a ball with Shima's birthday-based fortune-telling. When they discover that Izumo's birthday is coming up, they decide to throw her a surprise party!
name: An Ordinary Day

description:
Japanese title: Kamen (假面)

Southern Cross Monastery, where Rin and Yukio grew up, has come under attack by a mysterious assailant! Leaving behind the cryptic words: "I will never forgive anyone related to Satan," the masked assailant escapes...
name: Mask

description:
Japanese title: Himitsu no Hanazono (秘密の花園)

The assailant has escaped, but things are just getting back to normal after the monastery attack. Just then, someone appears before Yukio!
name: The Secret Garden

description:
Japanese title: Akuma-Gari (悪魔狩り)

In light of the recent incidents, Mephisto is dismissed from his post as director. The Orders Supreme Advisors are ousted as well, paving the way for Ernst to become Pope. And the newly appointed Preceptor of the Japan Branch is revealed to be...
name: Demon Hunting

description:
Japanese title: Shinjitsu (真実)

Ernst is scheming to open the Gehenna Gate by using the blood of Rin, son of Satan. In order to protect his wounded older brother, Yukio offers to take his place.
name: Truth

description:
Japanese title: Majin no Rakuin (魔神の落胤)

Hordes of demons are spilling out of Gehenna Gate, and are now indiscriminately attacking the people of True Cross Academy Town! Meanwhile, Rin has been rescued by Suguro and Shiemi and is starting to come to. What Rin sees when he awakens is...
name: Satan's Spawn

description:
Japanese title: Toki yo Tomare (時よ止まれ)

Satan has transformed himself into a gigantic Gehenna Gate, and is attempting to absorb all of Assiah. Rin and Yukio, joined by Shura and Angel, attack the gate. Meanwhile, at the school, the exorcists defend against a myriad of demons.
name: Stop, Time

description:
Japanese title: Kōri no Joō (氷の女王)

The soldiers at Fort Briggs remain ever vigilant against the threat of spies from Drachma. The massive compound may seem impenetrable - but a violent intruder offers destructive proof to the contrary.
name: Ice Queen

description:
Japanese title: Kono Kuni no Katachi (この国のかたち)

Ed uncovers a conspiracy of staggering scope: a plot that has already claimed countless victims. Clues suggest that Fort Briggs will soon know bloodshed - and an entire nation will suffer.
name: The Shape of This Country

description:
Japanese title: Ame hitoyo (雨一夜)

Staying behind at the hideout, Rinji and Gozu become aware of a shinobi following their tracks. At the same time, Kakashi and his team notice that the enemy is using a bat for surveillance. Both sides are now aware of each other’s presence, keeping careful eye on the other’s next move. Meanwhile, Guren takes Yukimaru and hurries back to her men. But Yukimaru comes down with a fever after being in the rain, forcing Guren to nurse him.
name: A Night of Rain

description:
Japanese title: Futatsu no omamori (ふたつのお守り)

At the Leaf Village Naruto is busy training with Gamakichi and Gamatatsu. But when he learns that Kakashi and the others are out on a mission to locate Orochimaru’s hideout, Naruto rushes to ask Tsunade if he can join the mission. Tsunade asks why he wishes to take part in this mission, and Naruto gives his answer… Meanwhile, Kakashi and the others regroup with Shino, who recovered the insect.
name: The Two Charms

description:
Japanese title: Miezaru teki (見えざる敵)

Team Yamato heads out to provide backup for Team Kakashi. Right before his departure Naruto gets a hint to perfect his new jutsu by entering Gamatatsu’s belly. Meanwhile, still with no leads, Kakashi and his team continue their pursuit mission when they are spotted and forced into an unplanned battle with Guren’s men. Caught by a surprise attack, the search team is divided into two. During the struggle, Gozu and Rinji’s abilities are revealed. What fate awaits the search team?
name: The Unseeing Enemy

description:
Japanese title: Ranhansha no meikyū (乱反射の迷宮)

From the results of the analysis of the crystallized Parasitic insects, the enemies currently fighting Kakashi’s team are identified as users of the Crystal Style, a rare type of jutsu. Still unclear on what Orochimaru’s objective is, Tsunade cannot hide her irritation and anxiety. Meanwhile, the search team fends off Gozu and Rinji only to find themselves in a peculiar situation. Along with Shino’s Parasitic insect barricade, they are all caught in the force field ninjutsu.
name: The Labyrinth of Distorted Reflection

description:
Japanese title: Arawareta hyōteki (現れた標的)

Shattering the force field with his newly mastered collaboration jutsu with the toads, Naruto and the reinforcement unit arrive at the battle site. But Naruto’s new jutsu is repulsed by Guren’s ability to crystallize fluids. Seeing that the battle is not in their favor, Kakashi, with help from the reinforcement unit, rescues Hinata, who was taken hostage, and the team barely manages to retreat from the battle.
name: The Target Appears

description:
Japanese title: Arekurū Bijū (荒れ狂う尾獣)

The Leaf ninja use The Bat to pursue Guren. Akamaru and Kiba detect a high level of chakra present at their destination. Convinced something abnormal is about to happen, Kakashi sends Naruto to the lake right before entering battle with the enemy. Meanwhile, Guren and the others execute their plan to capture the Three-Tailed Beast. Yukimaru is depleted of energy, forcing Guren and the others to suppress the now out-of-control Three Tails by force.
name: The Rampaging Tailed Beast

description:
Japanese title: Kiri no naka de (霧の中で)

Inside the heavy mist, the Leaf ninja manage to rendezvous with Naruto. The team tightens their guard when they learn that the mist surrounding the lake causes illusions. The team discovers that the enemy is after the Three-Tailed Beast, and faced with this unexpected development, Kakashi decides to ask for Tsunade’s guidance. Meanwhile Guren, left behind with Yukimaru, falls victim to the mist emitted by Three Tails and suffers from a mysterious illusion.
name: Inside the Mist

description:
Japanese title: Sorezore no omoi (それぞれの想い)

Naruto enters the mist to seek out Yukimaru. Guren stays alert to protect Yukimaru, whose current situation prevents him from moving. When both sides meet, their emotion over Yukimaru sparks. But the volatile tension is disrupted by—? Meanwhile the Leaf ninja search for the missing Naruto. After going over Naruto’s report and the enemy’s method of capturing the Tailed Beast, Kakashi comes to a certain conclusion.
name: Everyone's Feelings

description:
Japanese title: Saihensei! (再編成!)

Reinforcements arrive from the Leaf Village. The new mission from Tsunade: seal the Three-Tailed Beast so it won’t fall into anyone else’s hands and take Yukimaru whose powers are tied to the Tailed Beast into custody. Hinata, Sakura, Ino, and Shizune are selected for their skilled chakra control to form the sealing team, while the remaining members break into two groups to guard them. Anticipating a rematch with the Crystal-Style user, Kakashi devises a plan.
name: Regroup!

description:
Japanese title: Kekkai Shihō Fūjin (結界四方封陣)

The Leaf ninja wish to seal the Three-Tailed Beast, and Guren’s team wishes to stop them at any cost. Shizune’s sealing team begins their search as they activate the The Four-Corner Sealing Barrier to trap the Three-Tailed Beast, while team Yamato and team Kakashi stay on guard. When team Rinji and team Guren appear before them, the rematch battle finally begins. Kiba once again faces Kigiri, Nurari, and Kihou. Remembering his last battle with the three, Kiba warns Lee and Tenten.
name: The Four-Corner Sealing Barrier

description:
Japanese title: Shōton kuzushi (晶遁崩し)

To protect the The Four-Corner Sealing Barrier necessary to seal the Three-Tailed Beast, Kakashi and Naruto wage their deadly battle against Guren. Sai fights a one-on-one battle with Gozu. But against Guren’s awesome Crystal-Style attacks, team Kakashi slowly begins to lose ground. Can Kakashi’s secret plan crush Guren’s Crystal-Style? Meanwhile the sealing team manages to track down the Three-Tailed Beast’s location and puts their entire concentration on their chakra control.
name: Breaking the Crystal Style

description:
Japanese title: Kekkai kōbōsen (結界攻防戦)

Kabuto plans on breaking the Leaf’s The Four-Corner Sealing Barrier from the inside by using Yukimaru’s power and have the Three-Tailed Beast go on a rampage. Guren cannot argue, as Kabuto knows her weakness, but pleads for him to give her another chance to break the The Four-Corner Sealing Barrier. Meanwhile, Kakashi and Sai, Naruto and Shino split into two teams to track down Guren. Naruto wishes to find Guren at all costs to pinpoint Yukimaru’s whereabouts.
name: The Battle Over the Barrier

description:
Japanese title: Akai tsubaki (赤い椿)

To protect Guren from the raging Three Tails, Yuukimaru exerts powers beyond his limits. Moved by his action, Guren now comes to regret her past sin of killing Yuukimaru’s mother. When Yuukimaru runs out of power and loses control over Three Tails, the beast directs its anger toward Yuukimaru, attempting to kill its unwanted master. Guren desperately tries to draw the beast’s attention away, while one man calmly observes Guren and Yuukimaru’s mutual desire to protect one another.
name: Red Camellia

description:
Japanese title: Goetsudōshū (呉越同舟)

To protect Yuukimaru, Naruto and Guren fight alongside each other against the Three-Tailed beast and are swallowed. Inside the beast is an unnatural world filled with limestone. Naruto and Guren argue over who’ll take Yuukimaru, when an unexpected danger erupts. Meanwhile, the Leaf ninja manage to take Yuukimaru into custody but have lost sight of Naruto. Sakura treats Yuukimaru, who awakens to deliver a startling message.
name: Strange Bedfellows

description:
Japanese title: Tsubaki no michishirube (椿の道標)

The Leaf ninja learn that Naruto is inside the Three-Tailed beast. With no other alternative but to trust Yuukimaru’s mystical senses, Kakashi and the others follow the boy’s guidance and attempt a rescue mission. What method can they use to save Naruto and Guren, who have disappeared into the Three-Tailed beast’s alternate dimension? Meanwhile inside the Three-Tailed beast, Naruto and Guren are under attack from a smaller Three Tails.
name: Guidepost of the Camellia

description:
Japanese title: Juin no gyakushū (呪印の逆襲)

Despite the Leaf ninja rescue attempt, Naruto and Guren do not return. Frustration builds among the group, but as Three Tails wakes from its sleep, the Sealing Team makes a second attempt at the Four Corner Sealing Barrier. Sai tries to bring Yuukimaru to safety but is suddenly attacked by Nurari, Kiho and Kigiri, who are now enhanced by Kabuto’s jutsu, and Yuukimaru is taken away. With the Leaf’s attempt to seal Three Tails nearing completion, dark thoughts begin to fill Kabuto.
name: Counterattack of the Curse Mark

description:
Japanese title: Tsumi no kioku (罪の記憶)

Kabuto plots to have Three Tails crush the Leaf ninja by sacrificing Yuukimaru’s power and life. Controlled by Yuukimaru, Three Tails’ awesome power is about to break free from the seal, when an unexpected ally saves Shizune’s sealing team. Meanwhile Naruto and Guren arrive before Yuukimaru, who is weakened after having his powers forced out. Yuukimaru regains consciousness thanks to Guren’s earnest calling, but Rinji then reveals the truth behind the death of Yuukimaru’s mother.
name: Memory of Guilt

description:
Japanese title: Kudakareta yakusoku (砕かれた約束)

Kabuto finally appears before Naruto. Learning that Orochimaru used Guren’s and Yuukimaru’s feelings for his own purposes, an enraged Naruto enters battle against Kabuto. Guren tries to escape with the weakened Yuukimaru, but Rinji, who is now under the control of Kabuto, stops them. With her Crystal Style prevented by Rinji’s sonic powers, Guren is gradually cornered. Determined to save Yuukimaru, whom she promised to protect, Guren resorts to her final tactic.
name: Shattered Promise

description:
Japanese title: Kaerubeki basho (帰るべき場所)

The Leaf ninja fall back and tend to their wounds. The battle has left everyone with serious injuries. Shizune examines Yuukimaru, who is in a coma, but his body is no longer able to control Three Tails. Hearing the report, Tsunade decides it is impossible to continue the mission. Tsunade orders the Leaf ninja to return to the village so they can decide new measures based on the information they have gathered. But that night Yuukimaru goes missing.
name: A Place to Return To

description:
Japanese title: Daija no dōkō (大蛇の瞳孔)

Orochimaru agonizes in pain at his hideout, now requiring level-ten medications just to sustain his body. Even with excruciating pain Orochimaru is preparing for his transference ritual, and Kabuto can feel Orochimaru’s further potential.
name: The Serpent's Pupil

description:
Japanese title: Taka no hitomi (鷹の瞳)

Orochimaru sheds his old body and transforms into a white serpent. As he attacks Sasuke to obtain his body, Orochimaru remembers the time he found the slough of a white snake in front of his parents’ grave.
name: The Eye of a Hawk

description:
Japanese title: Zabuza no daitō (再不斬の大刀)

Sasuke has defeated Orochimaru. He then frees Suigetsu, a man trapped inside a water tank, and tells the man to join him. But Suigetsu does not immediately take up Sasuke’s offer…
name: Zabuza’s Blade

deck: As the Turtles search for Karai, they have to deal with a city filled with Kraangdroids as well as Zeck and Steranko, who hunt Karai for their own means.
name: Serpent Hunt

has_staff_review.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Episode #310 - "Serpent Hunt"

description:
Japanese title: Teppeki no bannin (鉄壁の番人)

Sasuke and Suigetsu visit the southern hideout to recruit their next member, Karin. Suigetsu is surprised at the hideout’s low security level but is told that no prisoners can escape thanks to Karin’s abilities.
name: Guardian of the Iron Wall

description:
Japanese title: Kita ajito no Jūgo (北アジトの重吾)

Sasuke and his team head for the northern hideout to recruit their next member, Jugo. On the way, Karin explains that the northern hideout is a site for conducting horrific human experiments.
name: Jugo of the North Hideout

description:
Japanese title: Kessei! (結成!)

Slipping past the riot, Sasuke arrives at Jugo’s cell. But Jugo refuses to be released, even going as far as to say he rather die a lonely death than to leave the hideout.
name: Formation!

description:
Japanese title: Kakashi Gaiden ~ Senjō no bōizuraifu ~ Zenpen (カカシ外伝～戦場のボーイズライフ～前編)

More than ten years ago, the rule of the Five Great Shinobi Nations was destabilized, throwing the world into a conflict later to be known as the Third Great Ninja War.
name: Kakashi Chronicles: A Boy's Life On the Battlefield, Part 1
